Ranking of Youth Standard

The following results are from the WDSF Open taken place in San Lazzaro di Savena (Bologna) - Italy on 05 January 2013

Ranking

Final

RankCoupleCountryStart #BasePoints

2.Lorenzo Alberetti - Martina DionigiItaly35270256

4.Gabriele Cassai - Galoppi SofiaItaly64220209

6.Alessandro Grilli - Miriana GalliItaly109180171
